page.title: 12 A SCHOOL TRIP IN 1985
page.content: On Friday morning at School we were going on our School trip.We went on a bus to Dorchester.At Dorchester we went into the Museum we saw some slides about Maiden Castle.Maiden Castle is a very big hill fort.There are dips in it called ramparts.In the Museum there are real skeletons that were dug up in the 1930's.We went to Maiden Castle and we walked nearly all around it.We went into a dip and then we climbed up the ramparts and down a chalkway then we went back to the bus.On the pathway there was a wire track.Then we went to Weymouth.Some of us swam in the sea and the others went into the arcades.After that we all went on the Swing Boats.I went realy high.then we were allowed to choose weather we would go on the trampolines or the donkeys.I went on the donkeys with my friends.Then we went home.
